page.title: 13Draycott School-Community
page.content:
Draycott Manor County Primary School serves a vital role in the community as there are no other comparable buildings in the area which are available for use by residents. The building is often used by the Parents, Teachers and Friends Association of the school both for money raising activities and social functions such as badminton.
Many other local groups such as the Women's Institue and the North Staffordshire Guild of Spinners, Dyers and Weavers use the school for their meetings.
